short_summary: Procurement of 2x Truck Ice Resurfacing and ILS deliverables for delivery in Canada within 120 days
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to procure Qty 2x Truck Ice Resurfacing and ILS deliverables for delivery to CFB Halifax and CFB Gagetown.
duration_in_months: In Options may be exercised within 12 months of contract award
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Title
TRUCK ICE RESURFACING

### Reference Number
CB-677-18334157

### Solicitation Number
W8476-246818/A

### Publication Date
February 23, 2024

### Tender Closing Date
March 27, 2024 at 14:00:00

## Tender Details

*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive Traditional
*   **Solicitation Process**: Request for Proposal
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

## Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

*   **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

## Contracting Entity Information

*   **Contracting Entity**: National Defence H
*   **Contracting Entity Address**:
    *   101 Colonel By Drive
    *   Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2
    *   Canada

## Contacts

genevieve.roach@forces.gc.ca

Please note that this tender announcement is expired. Any further inquiries or business regarding this tender should be directed to the above contact.    .
